Name: VR Kyoto: Beauty of Japan
About the game: Immerse yourself in the world of Japanese beautiful places / towns for about 20 minutes. You will find japanese ladies, streets, towns and gardens. There is not much interactivity, so you can't grab things at the moment. It is a tour. Enjoy 20 minutes walk in Japan! In the game, you will be able to move freely, enter open rooms, visit the streets, towns and temples, to achieve a relaxing and enjoyable walking tour. Instructions: Movement: The trigger button of the right controller for movement; press the touchpad of the right controller to turn left and right. MENU: Menu button on the left controller for menu; press trigger button of the left controller to selcect.
